original_text: I created the earth with my own hand. With my right hand, I hung up the sky like a curtain. When I call to the stars, they all appear in their places. I created the earth with my own hand.
korean_text: 과연 내 손이 땅의 기초를 정하였고 내 오른손이 하늘을 폈나니 내가 그들을 부르면 그것들이 일제히 서느니라

sentences.original_text: I created the earth with my own hand.
I hung up the sky like a curtain.
When I call to the stars,
they all appear in their places.
I created the earth with my own hand.
